com.robindrew.sizeof.architecture

Class Architecture32

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robindrew.sizeof.architecture.Architecture32
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IArchitecture

    public class Architecture32
extends java.lang.Object
implements IArchitecture
    The 32-bit JVM architecture.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIZE_OF_ARRAY
      The number of bytes used to represent an array (before calulating contents).

      The number of bytes used to represent a boolean.

      The number of bytes used to represent a byte.

      The number of bytes used to represent a byte.
      static int SIZE_OF_INT
      The number of bytes used to represent a byte.
      static int SIZE_OF_LONG
      The number of bytes used to represent a byte.
      static int SIZE_OF_NULL_POINTER
      The number of bytes used to represent a pointer field (unassigned/null).
      static int SIZE_OF_OBJECT_INSTANCE
      The number of bytes used to represent an object (with no fields).
      static int SIZE_OF_OBJECT_MULTIPLE
      The number of bytes any object must be a multiple of.
      static int SIZE_OF_SHORT
      The number of bytes used to represent a byte.

      Returns the size of an object array with the given length.

      Returns the size in bytes of an object instance.
      long sizeOfPrimitive(java.lang.Class<?> type)
      Returns the size in bytes of the given primitive type.
      long sizeOfShortArray(long length)
      Returns the size of a short array with the given length.
